formal_name:
Jewel Quest Mysteries 3 -
The Seventh Gate
description:
Join Rupert and Emma in Jewel Quest
Mysteries as they traverse the ruins of
ancient Egypt! Mystery reigns and
only a keen eye can help you.
Discover hidden objects and secret
gems while playing classic Jewel
Quest as between level
mini-games! Jewel Quest Mysteries
Curse of the Emerald Tear
name:
Jewel Quest Mysteries 3 -
The Seventh Gate
